power.title: A Rock and a Hard Place
power.fluff: You focus to work in concert with your companions, harrying your opponents with relentless blows

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you and allies in your warlord's aura can use the Relentless Pressure attack at-will. Only one character can use the action during a given turn.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to the character attacks one or more of the character's allies, and misses all targets

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The character deals damage to the target equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier + the enhancement bonus of the character's weapon.
If the character's melee basic attack deals a type of damage, this action deals the same type of damage and gains the corresponding keyword.

power.title: Archery Commander
power.fluff: Your words advice your allies in avoiding retaliatory attacks and guide them to focused attention as they loose arrows and spells at your enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you do not provoke opportunity attacks for making ranged attacks, and your warlord's aura gains the following benefits:
► Allies in the aura do not provoke opportunity attacks from enemies you can see when making ranged attacks.

► When an ally hits an enemy you can see with a ranged attack, the next ally in your aura to hit that enemy with a ranged attack deals additional damage equal your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Bait the Hook
power.fluff: Your attacks and parries give an ally the encouragement and strength needed to respond to the foe's attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:

► When you attack an enemy, choose one ally in your warlord's aura. Until the end of your next turn, the target of your attack has vulnerable all against the chosen ally's attacks. The vulnerable equals your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.
► When an enemy attacks you, choose one ally in your warlord's aura as a free reaction. The chosen ally has combat advantage against the enemy until the start of that enemy's next turn.

► When an enemy bloodies you or scores a critical hit against you, you can use a free reaction to grant all allies in your warlord's aura a bonus to their first damage roll against that enemy. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modfier, and lasts until the end of the enemy's next turn.

power.title: Brave Warriors
power.fluff: Your charge emboldens your allies to do the same

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:
► Your charge attacks deal +1[W] damage, or +1d8 damage if your charge attack is not a Weapon attack.
► When you charge an enemy, allies who can see you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the target of your charge. This increases to +2 if the ally charges the enemy.

► When you hit with a charge attack, until the end of your next turn, allies gain a +1 power bonus to AC, and a power bonus to Will equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier or one-half your Charisma modifier.
